Nightlight/elita:

"Who are you?"said Nightlight while she tried to remember when she met 
Bump. She still was lying in the bed waitting that the scanner finished. 
Elita jumped to a side and waited that the check ends

"It's one of the dorctor that attended you while you were sleeping, mom" 
said ELita

"It seemed that passed years since I saw maximals or Autobots" whispered 
Nightlight and looking at Bump she said "I feel much better now that we 
leave the BLackFortress."

Elita waved happyly her tiny tail

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Monday, June 27, 2011 11:01 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Changing times (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)

> <OLD>
>
> Talon shook her head and walked slow and ly towards a corder while Kup 
> sighed and
> looked at Tucson and said "Nighlight is recovering fast and Elita is with
> her, Do you know if any of the Doctors are vailable  in order to perfomr a
> last check before she leaves the Medical Bay?"

<NEW>

Even as KUP was asking the question to TUSCON, there was indeed a
medic that was entering the medbay.

"Greetings Nightlight, and how are you doing little Elita?" It was
BUMP, one of the medics that had been working on NIGHTLIGHT, helping
her through. He had been damaged in the last battle that had even
spilled inside the ARK, but he, like the others, seemed to be healed.

He pulled out a scanner and began running it over NIGHTLIGHT, "How are
you feeling Nightlight?"BUMP said as he paused to check the readings
on the scanner, a proffesional smile on his face.

(TAG)

Preston
